meanings: [명사] escape, flight, [동사] escape, flee, bolt, run[get] away (from), take (to) flight, make a getaway, (formal) fly, (연인과 함께) elope
(가격하다) hit, strike, knock, (informal) smack, (informal) wallop, (손바닥으로) slap, (주먹으로) punch, (informal) slug
(박수·손뼉 등을) clap, applaud, (크게) give a big hand

vlive.korean: 그 사람이 도망친 느낌. 그 정도의 뒤통수를 크게 후려맞았죠. - 크게 맞았죠. so it was a huge betrayal. Like he just bounced. - It was a huge betrayal. 듣기 View video tvN : tvN '신서유기 외전-꽃보다 청춘 위너' LIVE TALK (Here Comes Trouble: Unplanned Trip LIVE TALK)
vlive.english: so it was a huge betrayal. Like he just bounced. - It was a huge betrayal.

vlive.korean: 그러니까 무조건 도망치라는 것도 아닌데 상황 판단을 잘 해서... I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks. 듣기 View video NCT : 천지의 고민상담소
vlive.english: I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks.

vlive.korean: 빨리 도망쳐나왔고요 그리고 뭐... So I ran away quickly and... 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만이네💚
vlive.english: So I ran away quickly and...

vlive.korean: 야 넌 내가 지금 도망치는 것 같냐? Do you think I'm running away? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 모두가 날 안믿고 의심할 때.. [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP12
vlive.english: Do you think I'm running away?

vlive.korean: 강동원 선배님 말씀하시는 거죠? - 네 - 로맨틱하게 도망치던 장면에서 이제... Are you talking about Kang Dong Won? - Yes. - It's a romantic chasing scene. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 생일 하루 전❤️❤️
vlive.english: Are you talking about Kang Dong Won? - Yes. - It's a romantic chasing scene.

examples.korean: There have been few escapes from it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지금까지 그것에서 도망친 경우는 거의 없다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There have been few escapes from it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many people escaping persecution are seeking refuge in this country. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 박해에서 도망친 많은 사람들이 이 나라에서 피난처를 구하고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many people escaping persecution are seeking refuge in this country. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Leafie, a Hen Into the Wild' tells the story of a hen who escapes her hen house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook '마당을 나온 암탉'은 닭장에서 도망친 암탉의 이야기이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Leafie, a Hen Into the Wild' tells the story of a hen who escapes her hen house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: During the bus ride, Harry learns that Sirius Black, an escaped convict, murdered thirteen people with one curse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 버스에 타고 있는 동안, 해리는 한번의 저주로 13명을 살해하고 도망친 죄수 시리우스 블랙에 관해 알게 된다. Neungyule
examples.english: During the bus ride, Harry learns that Sirius Black, an escaped convict, murdered thirteen people with one curse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The novel 'So Far From the Bamboo Grove' is about a Japanese family that escapes from Japanese-occupied Korea at the end of World War II. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대나무 숲 저 멀리'는 2차 세계 대전 말에 일본에 점령 당한 한국에서 도망친 일본 가족에 대한 소설이다. Neungyule
examples.english: The novel 'So Far From the Bamboo Grove' is about a Japanese family that escapes from Japanese-occupied Korea at the end of World War II. Add to Wordbook
